io.github.teamfractal.entity

Class MarketTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.teamfractal.entity.MarketTest

  • public class MarketTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Integration tests for Market and Player

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      org.junit.rules.ExpectedException exception 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MarketTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Contractor()
      Reset market to its default status.
      void testPlayerGambleLostBetRemovedFive()
      Tests Market.playerGamble(Player, int) ensures that when it returns GamblingResult.LOST the bet is removed from the players money (when the bet is 5)
      void testPlayerGambleLostBetRemovedTwelve()
      Tests Market.playerGamble(Player, int) ensures that when it returns GamblingResult.LOST the bet is removed from the players money (when the bet is 12)
      void testPlayerGambleMoneySameAsBet()
      Tests Market.playerGamble(Player, int) ensures that it does not return GamblingResult.NOTENOUGHMONEY when a player has exactly the same amount of money as the bet
      void testPlayerGambleNegativeBet()
      Tests Market.playerGamble(Player, int) ensures that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when a negative bet is passed to it
      void testPlayerGambleNoMoney()
      Tests Market.playerGamble(Player, int) ensures that it returns GamblingResult.NOTENOUGHMONEY when a player has no money (and the cost of the bet is at least 1)
      void testPlayerGambleOneLessMoneyThanBet()
      Tests Market.playerGamble(Player, int) ensures that it returns GamblingResult.NOTENOUGHMONEY when a player has 1 less money than the bet
      void testPlayerGambleWonBetAddedOne()
      Tests Market.playerGamble(Player, int) ensures that when it returns GamblingResult.WON the bet is added to the players money (when the bet is 1)
      void testPlayerGambleWonBetAddedTen()
      Tests Market.playerGamble(Player, int) ensures that when it returns GamblingResult.WON the bet is added to the players money (when the bet is 10)

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
